data.message: Of course Eminem is not going to rap like he did 10 or even 5 years ago. Artists change and evolve their music and sound , for good or worse. Eminem decided to change his flow and what he raps about.

replies.message: well said. i think that eminem is better than some of the rappers nowadays.
What made eminem so likeable was the fact that people could relate what he is saying in his songs. Now it's just meh music from him. If you listen to Vegas it sound like trap music.
